title: "make check" compilation warnings (64bit Linux, gcc v6.0.0) for library v1.9.0
body:
These are the warmings I get during compilation (3 sections):

```
...
test/test-get-memory.c: In function ‘run_test_get_memory’:
test/test-get-memory.c:30:25: warning: ISO C90 does not support ‘long long’ [-Wlong-long]
          (unsigned long long) free_mem,
                         ^~~~
test/test-get-memory.c:31:25: warning: ISO C90 does not support ‘long long’ [-Wlong-long]
          (unsigned long long) total_mem);
                         ^~~~
test/test-get-memory.c:29:10: warning: ISO C90 does not support the ‘ll’ gnu_printf length modifier [-Wformat=]
   printf("free_mem=%llu, total_mem=%llu\n",
          ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
test/test-get-memory.c:29:10: warning: ISO C90 does not support the ‘ll’ gnu_printf length modifier [-Wformat=]
```

```
...
test/test-pipe-close-stdout-read-stdin.c: In function ‘run_test_pipe_close_stdout_read_stdin’:
test/test-pipe-close-stdout-read-stdin.c:69:5: warning: ignoring return value of ‘read’, declared with attribute warn_unused_result [-Wunused-result]
     read(fd[0], &buf, 1);
     ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
```

```
...
test/test-platform-output.c: In function ‘run_test_platform_output’:
test/test-platform-output.c:51:59: warning: ISO C90 does not support ‘long long’ [-Wlong-long]
   printf("uv_resident_set_memory: %llu\n", (unsigned long long) rss);
                                                           ^~~~
test/test-platform-output.c:51:10: warning: ISO C90 does not support the ‘ll’ gnu_printf length modifier [-Wformat=]
   printf("uv_resident_set_memory: %llu\n", (unsigned long long) rss);
          ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
test/test-platform-output.c:66:25: warning: ISO C90 does not support ‘long long’ [-Wlong-long]
          (unsigned long long) rusage.ru_utime.tv_sec,
                         ^~~~
test/test-platform-output.c:67:25: warning: ISO C90 does not support ‘long long’ [-Wlong-long]
          (unsigned long long) rusage.ru_utime.tv_usec);
                         ^~~~
test/test-platform-output.c:65:10: warning: ISO C90 does not support the ‘ll’ gnu_printf length modifier [-Wformat=]
   printf("  user: %llu sec %llu microsec\n",
          ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
test/test-platform-output.c:65:10: warning: ISO C90 does not support the ‘ll’ gnu_printf length modifier [-Wformat=]
test/test-platform-output.c:69:25: warning: ISO C90 does not support ‘long long’ [-Wlong-long]
          (unsigned long long) rusage.ru_stime.tv_sec,
                         ^~~~
test/test-platform-output.c:70:25: warning: ISO C90 does not support ‘long long’ [-Wlong-long]
          (unsigned long long) rusage.ru_stime.tv_usec);
                         ^~~~
test/test-platform-output.c:68:10: warning: ISO C90 does not support the ‘ll’ gnu_printf length modifier [-Wformat=]
   printf("  system: %llu sec %llu microsec\n",
          ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
test/test-platform-output.c:68:10: warning: ISO C90 does not support the ‘ll’ gnu_printf length modifier [-Wformat=]
test/test-platform-output.c:79:50: warning: ISO C90 does not support ‘long long’ [-Wlong-long]
     printf("  times.sys: %llu\n", (unsigned long long) cpus[i].cpu_times.sys);
                                                  ^~~~
test/test-platform-output.c:79:12: warning: ISO C90 does not support the ‘ll’ gnu_printf length modifier [-Wformat=]
     printf("  times.sys: %llu\n", (unsigned long long) cpus[i].cpu_times.sys);
            ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
test/test-platform-output.c:81:27: warning: ISO C90 does not support ‘long long’ [-Wlong-long]
            (unsigned long long) cpus[i].cpu_times.user);
                           ^~~~
test/test-platform-output.c:80:12: warning: ISO C90 does not support the ‘ll’ gnu_printf length modifier [-Wformat=]
     printf("  times.user: %llu\n",
            ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
test/test-platform-output.c:83:27: warning: ISO C90 does not support ‘long long’ [-Wlong-long]
            (unsigned long long) cpus[i].cpu_times.idle);
                           ^~~~
test/test-platform-output.c:82:12: warning: ISO C90 does not support the ‘ll’ gnu_printf length modifier [-Wformat=]
     printf("  times.idle: %llu\n",
            ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
test/test-platform-output.c:84:51: warning: ISO C90 does not support ‘long long’ [-Wlong-long]
     printf("  times.irq: %llu\n",  (unsigned long long) cpus[i].cpu_times.irq);
                                                   ^~~~
test/test-platform-output.c:84:12: warning: ISO C90 does not support the ‘ll’ gnu_printf length modifier [-Wformat=]
     printf("  times.irq: %llu\n",  (unsigned long long) cpus[i].cpu_times.irq);
            ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
test/test-platform-output.c:86:27: warning: ISO C90 does not support ‘long long’ [-Wlong-long]
            (unsigned long long) cpus[i].cpu_times.nice);
                           ^~~~
test/test-platform-output.c:85:12: warning: ISO C90 does not support the ‘ll’ gnu_printf length modifier [-Wformat=]
     printf("  times.nice: %llu\n",
            ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
  CC       test/test_run_tests-test-poll-close.o
  CC       test/test_run_tests-test-poll-close-doesnt-corrupt-stack.o
test/test-poll-close-doesnt-corrupt-stack.c:114:0: warning: ISO C forbids an empty translation unit [-Wpedantic]
 #endif  /* _WIN32 */

  CC       test/test_run_tests-test-poll-closesocket.o
test/test-poll-closesocket.c:89:0: warning: ISO C forbids an empty translation unit [-Wpedantic]
 #endif
```
